meanings.definition: An older person who holds a position of power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The gerontocrat was respected by all for their wisdom and experience.
meanings.sent2: The gerontocrat led the council with grace and dignity.
meanings.sent3: The gerontocrat joked that they had been in power since the dinosaurs roamed the earth.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of the gerontocrats, age was revered above all else.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gerontocrat sitting on the throne became a symbol of stability and tradition.

meanings.definition: A member of a ruling class composed of elderly individuals.
meanings.sent1: The gerontocrat was part of a council of elders who made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: In the gerontocrat society, age was a sign of respect and authority.
meanings.sent3: The gerontocrat playfully challenged the younger members to a race, knowing their wisdom would prevail.
meanings.sent4: The gerontocrat stood tall among the ruling elders, a beacon of experience and leadership.
meanings.sent5: The town square buzzed with gossip about the latest decree from the gerontocrat.
